item.mdl_comment:
Exploratory module on the use of AI  
Use AI_API_PARAM, AI_API_KEY and AI_API_URL to configure the IA endpoint

item.sys_desc:
configuring api calls to an llm.
===============================
----
**If necessary, specify the api key in the AI_API_KEY system parameter.**
# Parrameters
## hist_depth
Defines the number of messages in the history used for the context.
The greater this number, the more tokens the request uses, but the more relevant is the response. 
## max_token
*optional*  
Limits the number of tokens in the ia response
### default_max_token
Maximum number of tokens in a usual context.
### code_max_token
Maximum number of tokens for thecnical calls.
## trigger
To define a trigger for ia calls in fields (under development)

# LLM spesific configuration exemple
## OpenAI:
```json 
{
	'model':'<gpt_model_to_use>',
	'OpenAI-Project': "<my_openai_project_id>",
	'OpenAI-Organization': "<my_openai_organization_id>",
	'hist_depth' : 3,
	'code_max_token' : 2000,
	'default_max_token':1500,
	'trigger':''
}

```
## Mistral
```json 
{
	'hist_depth' : 3,
	'code_max_token' : 2000,
	'default_max_token':1500,
	'trigger':''
}

```

item.fld_comment: List of fields to take into account for the chatbot

item.obe_comment:
AI contextual chat for personalised metrics. 
Use parameter "module" to specify context.

item.act_comment: Clear history in notePad for test object

For Process AIGenData  
Redo the genData step
Begin AIGenData Process from Module form
Begin AIModuleCreate Process from Module form
Call actionAICaller of AITools with object context and prompt in confirm box
Call Api to parse calculated field exp

For process AIModuleCreate
Go to RemoveModule activitie
For debug process AIModuleCreate, use Prompt activitie insted of interaction
For AIModuleCreate process call generation on interaction context

item.hlp_content: Express your need as concisely as possible
Exprimez votre besoin de la manière la plus concise possible

item.tsl_simplehelp:
List of attributes to consider when calling the chatbot.

  • Use semicolons or new lines to list the eligible fields.
  • If empty, no attributes will be taken into account.

Liste des attributs à prendre en compte lors de l'appel du chatbot.

  • Utilisez des points-virgules ou des nouvelles lignes pour lister les  attribut admissibles.
  • Si vide, aucun attribut ne sera pris en compte.
